description: Provide AI-powered real-time analysis and intelligence on NPM packages, including security, dependencies, performance, and quality metrics. Enable faster and safer package management decisions by integrating with Claude and Anthropic AI. Deliver comprehensive insights such as vulnerability scanning, download trends, and maintenance status to optimize your npm ecosystem.

NPM_REGISTRY_URL.description: URL of the NPM registry to use (default: https://registry.npmjs.org)

capabilities.name: npmVersions
capabilities.description: Get all available versions of an NPM package

capabilities.name: npmLatest
capabilities.description: Get the latest version and changelog of an NPM package

capabilities.name: npmDeps
capabilities.description: Analyze dependencies and devDependencies of an NPM package

capabilities.name: npmTypes
capabilities.description: Check TypeScript types availability and version for a package

capabilities.name: npmSize
capabilities.description: Get package size information including dependencies and bundle size

capabilities.name: npmVulnerabilities
capabilities.description: Check for known vulnerabilities in packages

capabilities.name: npmTrends

capabilities.name: npmCompare

capabilities.name: npmMaintainers

capabilities.name: npmScore
